name: Patrick Clark
text: I visit this place a lot since I work right next to it. I got to say their service is always fantastic and they keep the spot neat consistently. Prices are convenient and they serve large portions.

text: We ordered 16 original wings and recieved a 10 count of wings and a smiley face.

text: They refused to deliver to me even though I'm just 30 seconds past the Campground they deliver to. Explained I'm at home with 3 kids,  one being an infant. They said they don't go past a certain road. I explained said road is 10 ft from my driveway. TOTAL JERKS. LOST MY BIZ FOR GOOD. And a woman manager. Shame on you!

text: Usually I'm a very generous star giver, but in this situation I'm sad to say that I was not completely satisfied:( I tried to call just to ask if they could make a pizza 25 minutes before closing, before I could even ask her, she asked me ‚Ä¶More

text: The pizza was super cold and look like it was hours old and it tasted like it wasn‚Äôt completely cooked all the way the dough in some spots were super doughy, definitely won‚Äôt be coming back

name: Jenny
text: They need to really work on their quality control. Sometimes the pizza and bread are great and other times it's not good at all. If they consistently put enough cheese and toppings on the pizza and flavor on the crust they would be much better. So while their prices have went up their quality has NOT.

name: Tony Weiss
text: Hungry howie‚Äôs is my favorite, but I ordered one pizza with pepperoni and bacon and there was hardly any bacon on it. And somehow, half the pizza seemed to be slightly undercooked and the other half burnt. I‚Äôm not sure how they did it.

text: Overcharged me for my food. Then when I picked up pizza the workers were not wearing food service gloves to prepare the food. Another worker was eating pizza toppings with bare hands then continued making customers food. Totally ‚Ä¶More

name: Ytry
text: For a chain restaurant the food is good. Hungry howies as a chain has some of the best cheesy bread, and pizza crust flavors I've had at any pizza place. The prices are high compared to some other places though. You also end up waiting a bit for your food quite often.

name: Tina Smith
text: Friendly and efficient staff.

name: Thot Pockets
text: I liked the food. Pizza was great! If you want to get real pizza come here, and I recommend you all to try the cajun crust. It's good.

text: Folks here remember their regular customers and always get it right! I live too far for delivery but I'm sure that's on point too! Can order online or download the app but if you walk in thats fine they do there best to keep it quick!

name: erin hill
text: Has literally never gotten my order right. Not one single time. I live in Marysville and typically order from the Marysville store, they have never messed my order up, but I sometimes use this location when I am in the Wadhams area. I have ‚Ä¶More

text: Called 5 minutes before they closed and they still took a delivery order for us! Great service, friendly staff and definitely willing to go the extra mile for their customers!

name: Mark McCallum
text: Very good pizza and brownies at reasonable price.  They currently offer a reward program when you accumulate 6 orders of $10 or more you get a free medium 2 topping pizza via email code.  They have online tracking of order status. They cover a large delivery area.  The employees are always friendly!

name: Tammy Loxton
text: Love the food and the prices, I go too the one in Wadems, they have the friendliest staff. Never a long wait. Great deals also.

name: jen d
text: Nearly always get good pizza from both the Fort Gratiot and Wadhams locations in MI. My favorite chain pizza with the exception of Blaze Pizza that has no locations anywhere near me. I recommend the three cheeser bread, double cajun crust, and adding sriracha drizzle to your pizza. Yum!

text: We order alot from hear it was goid but whn the delivery man came tonight he opened the bag n mind u i had 3 large pizzas n bread..i had to grab thm myself out of his bag i was very disappointed in this delivery person n thn one pizza was stuck all to top of box...
